features_1280.title: Unlocked Mode
features_1280.desc: CPU and GPU clock tweaks for FloppyKernel.

options.label: Enabled
options.desc: CL0 2.2 GHz / CL1 2.496 GHz, GPU 1.209 GHz, UV disabled.

options.label: MegaFloppy
options.desc: CL0 2.2 GHz / CL1 2.6 GHz, GPU 1.209 GHz, UV disabled.

options.label: UltraFloppy
options.desc: CL0 2.2 GHz / CL1 2.704 GHz, GPU 1.209 GHz, UV disabled.

options.label: CoolFloppy
options.desc: CL1 capped 2.112 GHz (better efficiency/thermals), GPU stock, UV enabled.

options.label: Balanced
options.desc: CL0 2.2 GHz (OC), CL1 stock 2.4 GHz, GPU stock, UV disabled.

features_1280.title: Force Permissive
features_1280.desc: Force SELinux Permissive mode. For developers.

features_1280.title: EMS Efficient Mode
features_1280.desc: Enable EMS efficient scheduler mode. Reduces performance and improves battery.

features_trinket.title: Trinket Features
features_trinket.desc: Features for FloppyTrinketMi are not yet defined.
